text: is a train station on the Keihan Railway Keihan Main Line located in Asahi-ku, Osaka, Osaka Prefecture, Japan. ==Layout== *The station has 2 island platforms serving 2 tracks each on the 2nd level. The inner tracks are fenced because only local trains stop at this station. ==Adjacent stations== Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1931 Category:Railway stations in Osaka Prefecture
title: Morishōji Station
